#Text=Bob Broadhurst
#Text=Cmdr Bob Broadhurst
#Text=Commander Robert James Broadhurst OBE QPM was the 2012 Olympics Gold Command for the Metropolitan Police Service . [ 1 ]
#Text=He was formerly Commander for Public Order and Pan London Operational Support of London 's Metropolitan Police Service .
#Text=Police career
#Text=Broadhurst has served with the Metropolitan Police Service for 32 years in uniform , primarily in South-East London .
#Text=He was , for four years , Sutton Borough Commander and Lambeth deputy Borough Commander for a year .
#Text=For four years he was the Link Commander for South East London , with responsibility overall for all eight Boroughs in that area .
#Text=In July 2006 he was appointed Commander Public Order and Pan London Operational Support .
#Text=He has experience as a hostage negotiator , during the Stansted Airport Afghan Airlines hi-jack he was the Negotiator Team Leader .
#Text=At the longest siege in the UK , the Hackney Siege , which ended with the death of Eli Hall , [ 2 ] he was the Gold Commander -operational chief officer , .
#Text=He speaks at National Siege Management courses , and has contributed to the FBI Crisis Negotiator Course at the United States FBI Academy .
#Text=Since 1990 he has commanded public order events , including many large-scale demonstrations .
#Text=He commands ceremonial events such as the State Opening of Parliament , and Trooping the Colour .
#Text=At the wedding of the Prince of Wales and the Duchess of Cornwall he was the Gold Commander .
#Text=In 2007 he was in charge of policing for the London leg of the Tour de France and for the 2008 Summer Olympics torch relay .
#Text=He is leading operational planning for the 2012 Olympics .
#Text=He was involved in policing the 2009 Gaza Protests in London . [ 3 ]
#Text=Honours
#Text=In the 2005 Queens Birthday Honours list , Broadhurst was awarded the Queen 's Police Medal . [ 4 ]
#Text=He was appointed Officer of the Order of the British Empire ( OBE ) in the 2013 Birthday Honours for services to the public order policing of the Olympics . [ 5 ] [ 6 ]
#Text=G20 protests
#Text=He was in overall charge ( Gold ) of Operation Glencoe , during the 2009 G-20 London summit protests .
#Text=On 9 April he said "
